innerText: Pasannacitto sumano, avaṭaṃ [avaṇṭaṃ (sī.), ambaṭaṃ (syā.)] adadiṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.

children: sudaṃ āyasmā avaṭaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
innerText: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā avaṭaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā labujadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.

children: sudaṃ āyasmā udumbaraphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
innerText: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā udumbaraphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
Pasannacitto sumano, pilakkhassādadiṃ phalaṃ [pilakkhassa phalaṃ adaṃ (sī.), pilakkhussa phalaṃ adaṃ (syā.)].
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pilakkhaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā phārusaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā valliphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā kadaliphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.

children: vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā panasaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.

children: me sutvā, pitu chando ayaṃ ahu;
innerText: ‘‘Jātamattassa me sutvā, pitu chando ayaṃ ahu;
‘‘Caturaṅgulā ca me lomā, jātā pādatale ubho;
‘‘Atītā navuti kappā, ayaṃ eko ca uttari;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
‘‘Thero koṭivīso [koṭiviso (syā. ka.), koḷiviso (aññaṭṭhānesu)] soṇo, bhikkhusaṅghassa aggato;
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā soṇo koṭivīso thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.

children.innerText: [suṇātha bhikkhave mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā; ekaṃ araññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, disvā dinnaṃ pilotikaṃ; patthitaṃ paṭhamaṃ buddhaṃ, buddhattāya mayā tadā; pilotiyassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati; gopālako pure āsiṃ, gāviṃ pājeti gocaraṃ; pivantiṃ udakaṃ āvilaṃ, gāviṃ disvā nivārayiṃ; tena kammavipākena, idha pacchimake bhave; vipāsito yadicchakaṃ, na hi pātuṃ labhāmahaṃ (syā.)]

children: bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
innerText: [suṇātha bhikkhave mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā; ekaṃ araññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, disvā dinnaṃ pilotikaṃ; patthitaṃ paṭhamaṃ buddhaṃ, buddhattāya mayā tadā; pilotiyassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati; gopālako pure āsiṃ, gāviṃ pājeti gocaraṃ; pivantiṃ udakaṃ āvilaṃ, gāviṃ disvā nivārayiṃ; tena kammavipākena, idha pacchimake bhave; vipāsito yadicchakaṃ, na hi pātuṃ labhāmahaṃ (syā.)] ‘‘Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;

children.innerText: [suṇātha bhikkhave mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā; ekaṃ araññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, disvā dinnaṃ pilotikaṃ; patthitaṃ paṭhamaṃ buddhaṃ, buddhattāya mayā tadā; pilotiyassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati; gopālako pure āsiṃ, gāviṃ pājeti gocaraṃ; pivantiṃ udakaṃ āvilaṃ, gāviṃ disvā nivārayiṃ; tena kammavipākena, idha pacchimake bhave; vipāsito yadicchakaṃ, na hi pātuṃ labhāmahaṃ (syā.)]

innerText: Pilotikassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati [suṇātha bhikkhave mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā; ekaṃ araññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, disvā dinnaṃ pilotikaṃ; patthitaṃ paṭhamaṃ buddhaṃ, buddhattāya mayā tadā; pilotiyassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati; gopālako pure āsiṃ, gāviṃ pājeti gocaraṃ; pivantiṃ udakaṃ āvilaṃ, gāviṃ disvā nivārayiṃ; tena kammavipākena, idha pacchimake bhave; vipāsito yadicchakaṃ, na hi pātuṃ labhāmahaṃ (syā.)].
‘‘Munāḷi nāmahaṃ dhutto, pubbe aññāsu jātisu [aññāya jātiyā (udāna aṭṭha.)];
Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
Taṃ cāhaṃ āgataṃ disvā, abbhācikkhiṃ adūsakaṃ.
‘‘Rājāhaṃ patthivo [pattiko (syā. ka.), khattiyo (udāna aṭṭha.)] āsiṃ, sattiyā purisaṃ haniṃ;
Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi [pakopesi (sī.)], na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
Macchake ghātite disvā, janayiṃ somanassakaṃ [somanassahaṃ (udāna aṭṭha.)].

children: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho
innerText: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho [viṭaṭubho (syā. ka.)].
Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.

children: sudaṃ bhagavā attano pubbacaritaṃ kammapilotikaṃ nāma buddhāpadānadhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsitthāti.
innerText: Itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā attano pubbacaritaṃ kammapilotikaṃ nāma buddhāpadānadhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsitthāti.
Phāru vallī ca kadalī, panaso koṭivīsako.
